dublinCore.dc:title: 113 HR 3804 IH: To repeal the annual adjustment of retired pay and retainer pay amounts for retired members of the Armed Forces under age 62.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Ms. Brownley of California introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Armed Services

form.official-title: To repeal the annual adjustment of retired pay and retainer pay amounts for retired members of the Armed Forces under age 62.

section.header: Repeal of annual adjustment of retired pay and retainer pay amounts for retired members of the Armed Forces under age 62
section.text: Section 403 of the Bipartisan Budget Act of 2013 is hereby repealed.
